high_descs: Turn around to face the wooden desk.
Pick up the black pen that is on the wooden desk just to the left of a pencil.
Look down at the front edge of the wooden desk.
Put the black pen into the white mug that is to the right of the blue book and second from the edge of the desk.
Pick up the mug with the black pen in it off of the wooden desk.
Look up at the top of the wooden desk.
Put the mug with the black pen in it on the top of the wooden desk to the left of the analog clock.
anns.task_desc: Put a mug with a pen in it on top of the wooden desk.

high_descs: Turn to your right and face desk
Pick up the pen on the desk
Look down in front of the desk
Put the pen in the second mug beside the book
Pick up the mug with pen
Look up on the upper part of the desk shelf
Put the mug with pen on top of the shelf
anns.task_desc: Put mug with pen on top of the desk shelf

high_descs: Turn around to face the desk.
Pick up the pen on the desk, between the clock and the pencil.
Look down, toward the mugs on the desk.
Put the pen in the mug, located in front of the clock.
Pick up the mug with the pen in it.
Look up, toward the top layer of the desk.
Place the mug on the desk, to the left of the clock.
anns.task_desc: Put a mug with a pen in it on the desk.
